txt.en: Cabed wants you to help him not only deliver a message, but also discover the identity of the threat that has taken hold in Ost Celebrant.

'I know what Doron told you, [placeholder]. However, there is much that you still do not know.

'Something terrible has come to Ost Celebrant, and while I am not sure exactly what it is, I know it can only bring more destruction to this field.

'There are two tasks I have for you. If you will honour me with your service, I will guide you to the knowledge you seek.'
Cabed has sent you to complete two tasks before he reveals what he knows about a hidden threat in Parth Celebrant. Cabed is located along the southern road of Parth Celebrant.
'Very good then...it is done. You honour me with your aid, and for that, I will serve you in turn.'
Cabed is located along the southern road of Parth Celebrant.\n\nYou should return to Cabed with news of your success.
'Complete my tasks, I shall speak more with you.'
